name: The Assassins: PD Games Volume 250
description:
Assassins PD Games vol 250 is the one in a series of compilations of public domain games 'developed' by The Assassins who produced at least two hundred and fifty such compilations in the 1990's. Typically these contained between two and six games many of which had been featured on cover discs for the UK versions of magazines such as Amiga Power and Amiga Format. The games in this compilation were:
  • Blobble
  • All Rounder
  • Quadrille

shot.caption: By 1994 the standard information screen had evolved quite a bit from the earlier compilations

Pressing F4 from the game selection screen opensthe Assassins' text reader. Documents are selected by clicking in the grid at the top of the screen. Only one game in this compilation has documentation
An example of the game documentation that can is supported
